Datatable.LocalizationPair: (Chicken Traits) Return the worth of volcanic tiles to vanilla values. Unique to Kapakus.
(Chicken Traits) Start with some strategic resources.
You cannot have other Volcanoformer traits present; only one at a time. Either this, the other one, or the vanilla one.
(Chicken Traits) 2-tile wide Volcanoformer. You cannot have other Volcanoformer traits present; only one at a time. Either this, the other one, or the vanilla one.
(Chicken Traits) Region-wide Volcanoformer. You cannot have other Volcanoformer traits present; only one at a time. Either this, the other one, or the vanilla one.
(Chicken Traits) This has no effects. It is just for testing. Though, I suppose you can use it as a handicap, if you'd like.
